text: I'm looking for some paper dealing with this problem, but haven't found any yet. Maybe I'm using the wrong keywords!

elements.text: I'm looking for some paper dealing with this problem, but haven't found any yet. Maybe I'm using the wrong keywords!

text: I think the keyword I was looking for is the GUPTRI algorithm, which unfortunately is not available in Julia or LAPACK... I keep digging.

elements.text: I think the keyword I was looking for is the GUPTRI algorithm, which unfortunately is not available in Julia or LAPACK... I keep digging.

text: GUPTRI seems to be designed to deal with the case in which both A and B matrices have a common nullspace. Not sure about the case where their nullspace is different (which is the one I need)
